shortDescription: Command Injection in the Ping Module in the Web Interface on Technicolor TD5336 OI_Fw_v7 devices allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary OS commands as root via shell metacharacters in the pingAddr parameter to mnt_ping.cgi.
vulnerabilityName: technicolor td5336_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
